html: Today illustrates that doing what is right for those who need it most can still happen in Washington. The @HouseCommerce advanced the ACE Kids Act. I congratulate and extend my heartfelt thanks to my colleagues and those who have advocated on behalf of ACE Kids over the years.
text: Today illustrates that doing what is right for those who need it most can still happen in Washington. The @HouseCommerce advanced the ACE Kids Act. I congratulate and extend my heartfelt thanks to my colleagues and those who have advocated on behalf of ACE Kids over the years.

html: Tomorrow, @HouseCommerce will vote to pass the ACE Kids Act out of the full Committee. This legislation will help children with complex medical conditions and their families. I look forward to working with my colleagues to advance this legislation and bring it to the House Floor.
text: Tomorrow, @HouseCommerce will vote to pass the ACE Kids Act out of the full Committee. This legislation will help children with complex medical conditions and their families. I look forward to working with my colleagues to advance this legislation and bring it to the House Floor.

html: The @HouseCommerce will hold a legislative hearing on the ACE Kids Act, September 5. ACE Kids is a very important bill that I have been working on for the past couple of years, that will help vulnerable children with very difficult medical conditions receive the care they need.
